title: Hands-On Lab: Document-Oriented in Big Data And Databases

sections.title: Exploring Document-Oriented

exercises.description: Implement a basic example demonstrating Document-Oriented
exercises.starter_code:
# TODO: Implement Document-Oriented
# Your code here

sections.background: Document-Oriented NoSQL DB stores and retrieves data as a key value pair but the value part is stored as a document. The document is stored in JSON or XML formats. The value is understood by the DB and can be queried.
